meanings.definition: A person who takes part in a violent disturbance of the peace.
meanings.sent1: The rioters caused chaos in the city streets.
meanings.sent2: The police were called to disperse the rioters at the protest.
meanings.sent3: The rioters seemed to think breaking windows was a fun game.
meanings.sent4: The rioters were like a storm of anger sweeping through the town.
meanings.sent5: The image of the rioters smashing cars stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of people who engage in violent behavior in a public place.
meanings.sent1: The angry mob turned into rioters and started destroying property.
meanings.sent2: The rioters were arrested for their violent actions during the demonstration.
meanings.sent3: The rioters looked like a group of troublemakers causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: The rioters were a dark cloud over the peaceful protest.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the rioters fighting was unsettling and frightening.
